description: A trap describing a Problem Alert that indicates a Abnormality condition
became active.

event.Summary: Problem alert $v17 is active on $v2; Root cause : $v6

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwTrapProblemActive VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertAliveServerName s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertEntityName s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertEntityType s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertTimestamp s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertCriticality s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertRootCause s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertURL s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertID s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertMessage s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertType s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertSubtype s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertHealth s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertRisk s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertEfficiency s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertMetricName s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertResourceKind s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertDefinitionName s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertDefinitionDesc s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertImpact s EXAMPLE VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertNotificationRules s EXAMPLE

description: The name of the vRealize Operations server that generated this alert.
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertAliveServerName

description: The resource name on which this alert was generated.
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertEntityName

description: The resource kind type on which this alert was generated.
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertEntityType

description: The timestamp of the alert in UTC format.
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertTimestamp

description: A text string describing the alert criticality level
i.e. Info, Warning, Immediate and Critical.
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertCriticality

description: A text string describing the root-cause of the notification that was generated
i.e. state, date (human readable) and of the alert that was triggered.
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertRootCause

description: The URL of the 'Alert Summary' page of the alert that was generated.
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertURL

description: The unique vRealize Operations identifier of the alert that was generated.
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertID

description: The detailed symptom level info message of the alert that was generated
i.e. Symptom set id, affected object count
name, criticality and id of the symptom
metric/property name and violation
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertMessage

description: The textual type description of the alert that was generated
i.e. Application, Virtualization/Hypervisor, Hardware(OSI), Storage or Network
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertType

description: The textual subtype description of the alert that was generated, i.e.
Performance, Configuration, Availability, Capacity or Compliance
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertSubtype

description: Health badge state, i.e. Info, Warning, Immediate and Critical.
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertHealth

description: Risk badge state, i.e. Info, Warning, Immediate and Critical.
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertRisk

description: Efficiency badge state, i.e. Info, Warning, Immediate and Critical.
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertEfficiency

description: The textual violated metric name of the one of the alarm of the alert that was generated.
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertMetricName

description: Resource kind name of the object on which alert was generated.
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertResourceKind

description: Description of the alert that was triggered
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertDefinitionName

description: Detailed description of the alert that was triggered
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertDefinitionDesc

description: Badge impact of the alert that was triggered, i.e. Health, Risk or Efficiency
See More:
https://docs-staging.vmware.com/en/vRealize-Operations-Manager/6.7/com.vmware.vcom.metrics.doc/GUID-D04D495F-6FA7-483F-9EC9-C0EC35A6D887.html
variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertImpact

variables.name: VMWARE-VROPS-MIB::vmwAlertNotificationRules

description: A trap describing a Problem Alert that indicates a Abnormality condition
became inactive.

event.Summary: Problem alert $v17 on $v2 is inactive on $v2

description: A trap describing a Problem Alert that indicates a Abnormality condition
has changed one of its parameters' value.

event.Summary: Parameter value changed for problem alert $v17 on $v2
